name: Block Sumo
description:
Block Sumo is a local multiplayer game for 2 players.

Player 1 use WASD.
Player 2 use Arrow keys.

Key Features


  • Step on your friend and turn him or her into stone, then push them down to abyss!
  • 1 vs 1 Gameplay. Duel with your buddy for bets!
  • 5 interesting series of scene.
  • Pick up items, use them wisely to turn the tide!
  • 35 different levels.
  • 20 pixel character skins.

Single player mode: Joker Besides Me


Have fun!
